availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Francis "Frank" Smith (Clark County, Indiana, day laborer)

body.p: Clark County, Indiana, day laborer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Wyatt Smith in Jefferson County on December 2, 1858. Father of Elizabeth Smith, Rachael Smith, Thomas Smith, and Rebecca Smith. Day laborer in Jeffersonville, Indiana, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Indiana, Clark County, Bethlehem, p. 42A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Indiana, Clark County, Jeffersonville, p. 388.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Indiana, Miami County, Peru Ward 2, p. 181A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000819609.
KYR-0001-022-0011.
KYR-0001-022-0014.
